OmniIntegrationProcedure.description: Processes the household income details from the applicant's assessment response, and creates or updates party income records.
OmniIntegrationProcedure.name: ProcessHouseholdIncome

childElements.name: CreateNewPartyIncomeRecord
childElements.propertySetConfig: { "executionConditionalFormula" : "ISBLANK(FetchExistingPartyIncomeRecordForSameEmployer:PartyIncomeId)", "failureConditionalFormula" : "", "failOnStepError" : true, "useFormulas" : true, "additionalInput" : { "CalendarYear" : "=%IncomeData:CalendarYear%", "StartDate" : "=%IncomeData:StartDate%", "EndDate" : "=%IncomeData:EndDate%", "IncomeType" : "Salary", "Employer" : "=%HouseholdIncomeDetails:Employer%", "IncomeFrequency" : "=%HouseholdIncomeDetails:IncomeFrequency%", "PartyId" : "=%AccountId%", "IncomeAmount" : "=%IncomeData:IncomeAmount%", "IncomeStatus" : "Active" }, "additionalOutput" : { }, "failureResponse" : { }, "sendOnlyAdditionalInput" : true, "returnOnlyAdditionalOutput" : false, "returnOnlyFailureResponse" : false, "responseJSONPath" : "", "responseJSONNode" : "", "sendJSONPath" : "", "sendJSONNode" : "", "bundle" : "PSSUpsertPartyIncome1", "chainOnStep" : false, "actionMessage" : "", "show" : null, "label" : "DataMapperPostAction6", "disOnTplt" : false }
